data.message: Have to learn how to put this app on my phone

replies.message: Hello Howard. Safety Check is not an app, but rather a website that can be accessed here: https://www.facebook.com/about/safetycheck/. To learn more about this tool, visit: http://on.fb.me/1wm6VFE. -Rose

The links fb is providing just explain what the service does. You don't have to do anything or download anything. If you are in the area of a disaster, Facebook will notify you and give you instructions on how to proceed from there. YOU don't have to activate anything :) Facebook will decide when/who this applies to as the natural disasters etc happen and you'll be notified if you are in the affected area.
